item.title: Ubuntu Customization
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Debashish Deka)
item.description: How about customizing your new ubuntu installation? Default installation of Ubuntu 18.04 does not come with few things like, a good terminal theme, vim 8, touch-pad gestures for laptop, power management etc. This blog will explore some of the cool tools that we can use to make ubuntu a more convenient for developers. First lets install zsh + oh my zsh terminal: The combination of zsh and ohmyzsh makes your terminal work really simplified.
